description: Installation of new cast iron railings to front boundaries including front entrance gates and panel railings to front areas, landscaping to garden areas and removal of existing hedges.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:   Notwithstanding the aproved drawings, no permission is given for the laying of york stone paving in the front garden areas as shown. A landscaping scheme for each property which shows a reduced area of paving and the retention of existing hedges shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority prior to the commencement of work and the landscaping scheme shall be implemented as shown.

REASON:   In order to protect visual amenity and biodiversity and to comply with policies D6 and Env23 of the Council's Unitary Development Plan 2002 and the aims of the Conservation Area Design Guidelines and the Islington Urban Design Guide 2006.
